text: Paul Revere Dick (January 7, 1938 - October 4, 2014) was an American musician and organ player. In 1958, he and other musicians founded the group Paul Revere & the Raiders. They recorded many hits. He worked with the group until his death in 2014. Revere was born in Harvard, Nebraska. Revere died from cancer in Garden Valley, Idaho, aged 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American pianists Category:Cancer deaths in Idaho Category:Musicians from Nebraska Category:Musicians from Idaho
title: Paul Revere (musician)
